actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution asking that the President of the United States declare the first week of each November as Young Ladies' Radio League, Inc. National Week.

summary.text: Directs the President of the United States to declare the first week of each November as "Young Ladies' Radio League, Incorporated, National Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution asking that the President of the United States declare the first week of each November as Young Ladies' Radio League, Inc. National Week.
